data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Barahona unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Barahona, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 19,424 believers in Barahona.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 19,424 believers in the state of Barahona the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Barahona, Dominican Republic to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Japanese people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Japanese people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Japanese people is yours.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 19,424 believers living in Barahona, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Barahona, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Barahona, Dominican Republic has a population of 179,200.

We estimate Barahona has 19,424 people who might know Jesus, 148,652 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,124 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Barahona, Dominican Republic into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

location.name: Barahona
